resources.string: Life is booming in your planet. Economies are doing great, and technology is advancing at an astronomical pace. \nYou wake up, and everything seems as usual, except for a blinking light on your mail box by the door. \nYou also realize you\'re late for THE job interview.
You open the mail box, and find a plant vase. Inside it, a seed lays peacefully.
You get dressed in a hurry, and gulp down something for breakfast. It\'s late, and as you open the door to leave, you give a last glance at the blinking light.
GO BACK AND EXAMINE THE LIGHT
OH MY! LOOK AT THE TIME, I\'M LATE!!

To your surprise, the seed emits an hologram with a video message, from a woman you've never seen before. You hit play: 

"Hello, %1$s. I work for an underground society chased by international governments. We managed to develop a contraption capable of instantly eradicate any type of technology that uses fossil energy, also brainwashing people's mind and clean off their current habits. That's how we believe our planet could be preserved for longer generations. That contraption is the seed in the vase, code named: [tHhe_SeEd]. 
I was probably killed, reason why you received this message. All you have to do is press the \[EXECUTE\] button that will show up." 

The message ends.
SO STRANGE. BETTER NOT PLAY AROUND
Your worries about that blinking light slowly fades away from your mind. You look at the time and realize there\'s only one thing to do.

You press the button! The seed starts buzzing and emitting weird sounds. You get away from it, afraid of what might happen. Finally, a bright light shines through your house and a huge blast of energy comes from the seed, knocking you unconscious. There\'s a tremor that lasts for a minute. \nYou wake up with a hazy memory, and go outside without a single idea of what to do. The world feels different, yet you don\'t know how…

You managed to arrive at the interview just on time! It goes well, and you will start next week. There\'s a fading feeling about that blinking light, but you decide to prepare for the next big step of your career.
